reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 3-Piece Hardside Spinner Luggage Set with Built-In TSA Lock is a great option for anyone looking for a durable and affordable luggage set. The luggage is made of high-quality ABS material, which is lightweight and scratch-resistant. The spinner wheels make it easy to maneuver the luggage, even when it is fully loaded.The set includes three suitcases in different sizes: a 20-inch carry-on, a 24-inch suitcase, and a 28-inch suitcase. This makes the set ideal for both short and long trips. The suitcases also have a variety of interior features, such as mesh dividers and elastic straps, to help you keep your belongings organized.Used this set to travel to nicaragua from the US. Fully packed and held up great.Another thing I like about this luggage set is that it is very affordable. The price is very reasonable for the quality of the luggage. I am also impressed with the durability of the luggage. I have used it for several months now and it is still in perfect condition.Overall, I am very happy with the Amazon Basics 3-Piece Hardside Spinner Luggage Set with Built-In TSA Lock. It is a durable, affordable, and stylish luggage set that is perfect for both short and long trips. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a new luggage set.Here is a summary of the pros and cons of this luggage set:**Pros:*** Durable ABS material* Spinner wheels for easy maneuverability* Variety of interior features* Affordable price**Cons:*** None that I can think ofIf you are looking for a durable, affordable, and stylish luggage set, I highly recommend the Amazon Basics 3-Piece Hardside Spinner Luggage set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for overseas plane trip
reviews.reviewText: These worked very well as carryon for a recent overseas trip as our only luggage and fit easily in the overhead bins. They are attractive, sturdy, and easily maneuverable even down the airplane aisle. The price was right too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Roomy, sturdy, easy to wheel. Would definitely buy again. Love the bright orange color - stands out/easy to spot on baggage carousel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Price, Good Size, But Flimsy Handle
reviews.reviewText: This sturdy little suitcase holds more than I thought it would and fit nicely in the overhead bin. I used it for the items like shoes, books, purses, etc. that didn’t fit into my checked suitcase. On the way home, I had plenty of extra space for purchases I made during my vacation. The zippers are high quality and seem unlikely to break. It’s easy to roll through the airport, but like other reviewers, I found the handle flimsy and cheap, which is a shame because the body is durable. Given the great price, I wouldn’t expect perfection. 4 stars because of handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2019
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE BELOW.....Wow. These suitcases are AWESOME for the price! I was expecting a lot less. I purchased 3. I chose the bright, safety orange. Easy to see in the sea of other colors for sure. The outer shell is hard - sturdy feeling. The inside is roomy. They are around 5-6" deep in each side (I've included some pics - sorry about holding the ruler upside down - but you can see it's about 5 to 6") One side is zipper closed, the other side has elastic straps to contain contents. The outer zippers are sturdy feeling and run smoothly. There is also an 'extender' zipper giving you an extra 2" or so in depth. Honestly, these suitcases 'feel' as nice as some others I have purchased for literally 4x the price! All the nice care points too with the inner zipper, and additional pockets. It looks and feels like a suitcase way beyond the price point. Now, in all fairness, they are new to me and I will be using them on a trip in about a week. So, I will update my review should new info seem useful. The ad says they weigh just under 10lbs.. I used my handheld suitcase scale and it registered 9.1 lbs empty. One of the pics I included shows me holding a 12" ruler so you can get an idea of the width of the inside of the cases. The pull out handle is not as 'sturdy' feeling as I would like... but it works- It locks down and lifts easily. It appears or feels like the pullout handle is plastic at the handle part.. the bar appears to be lightweight aluminum - so it might be bent with lots of use.. we'll see. There are two grab handles one on the top and one the side of case. The outer wheels are multi-directional... and stick out quite a bit and I'm not sure they are as 'sturdy' as the rest of the case. If there is an 'Achilles heel' on these bags... the wheels may be it or possibly the pull handle.. but we as I said, time will tell and I never hesitate to update. I've included some pics and hope my review was helpful to you.UPDATE: 12/4/2019.... Have taken these suitcases through the airline system two times so far... NO problems to report. I am happier and happier with this purchase... but time will tell and I update if new info seem useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice color, light and strong
reviews.reviewText: Perfect luggage at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just right size for me.Very durable and easy to use. Wheels work great and rolls great.I have a backpack that slips on handle and I roll them both together. My last trip was very easy to carry.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente maleta al un super precio
reviews.reviewText: La usé para un viaje internacional y aguantó un mes como guerrera, en viajes nacionales la he usado en al menos 10 veces y sigue como nueva. Materiales muy resistentes, las rueditas y la agarradera siguen sirviendo como al principio.
Great bargain for a good quality suitcase. It glides well and is light weight. Easy to pack and survived my trip with no cracks or breaks.

Great quality, durable, nice bright blue so you can see it easily on the carousel. Just took it to Florida, stayed in 3 different hotels so it got a good work out. Lots of space and moves around much nicer on carpet then my husbands large Samsonite case. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sturdy and has a lot of space
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a reasonable price and the luggage is spacy, sturdy, and its even expandable for an inch extra in size for that extra thing you need to pack.

I had used this on a recent trip to Japan and Korea and Hong Kong; and quite satisfy with it. It has almost all functionality and features as other carry on but more than half the price. The outer shell plastic is actually quite durable; after the Asia trip, I can only identify a small scratch on one of the upper corner. Otherwise, it holds up very well, no dent, no unsightly scratches. And the double wheels still move very smoothly. The telescopic handle works very well without issue. The 2 handles are very useful (one top handle and one side handle which helps greatly while lifting up to the overhead bin). The inside is spacious and really love the expandable feature (which can accommodate the many clothing I bought during the trip...). Overall, it's a great value for the money; you won't be disappointed. Just as all the commercials you'd seen : Why pay more for the same thing.... Yes, it's true. I compared to many similar carry on before I bought this one. Many other that are double the price or more, doesn't have all the features this Amazon one has; except that this one doesn't look as attractive as the other more expensive ones.; but value and quality and durability and usability for the money, you can't beat that.... Highly Recommended.
